name: Effy Blaster
description:
Project date: 2021/18/11

Project time: 4 hours

Effy is causing trouble again.. This time she's made a highly volatile Effy Blaster! Help Effy fight off the forces of evil in this action packed shoot-em-up game while getting a hi-score and collecting colorful powerups by shooting them to improve Effy's mechanism of war!

-Use the mouse to aim and hold down left click to shoot.

-Destroy Green orbs to improve Effy's rate of fire.

-Destroy Red orbs to improve Effy's damage.

-Destroy Yellow orbs to improve Effy's accuracy and range.

-Beware of tough bosses

-Destroy enemies to gain score

-If too many enemies make it through, Effy will lose :c

- dw if you destroy the final boss then Effy wins ;))))

-recommend playing your own music in the background for best experience


The download button's all the way down there,  come on, scroll down quick and ignore that boring paragraph coming up there. its probably some boring shit like install instructions lol

-fr  this is a broken piece of trash unplayable game and its so stressful to play though xDDDD but its cute and I did put my heart into it though so hopefully you enjoy playing ^-^ idk how to feel about it... I just couldn't sleep tonight. when i saw the first boss pop in with that yelling face i laughed so hard i knew in that moment I had to finish it instead of trashing it. but yeah, idk now. i guess at least I did something. Always doubting myself. I had fun making this, it was like, my own personal mini game jam, i was in my bubble for few hours just vibin.. 4 hours later and im terrified of clicking on the upload button. I'm so scared of getting judged for doing something I love. I just wanna make games that make people happy or something, idk. idk what I want. idk why I'm inspired by what I'm inspired by. I don't want to think about this anymore. fuck you, me, this is going up. show the world how much you make awesome fucking games.
